code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Payment=()=>{const[selectedMethod,setSelectedMethod]=useState("");const handlePayment=()=>{alert(`Bạn đã chọn thanh toán bằng: ${selectedMethod}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"payment",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Thanh to\xE1n v\xE9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Vui l\xF2ng ch\u1ECDn ph\u01B0\u01A1ng th\u1EE9c thanh to\xE1n:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"payment-methods",children:["Ví điện tử Momo","Thẻ ngân hàng","Thanh toán khi nhận vé"].map(method=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:method,checked:selectedMethod===method,onChange:e=>setSelectedMethod(e.target.value)}),method]},method))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePayment,disabled:!selectedMethod,children:"X\xE1c nh\u1EADn thanh to\xE1n"})]});};export default Payment;
